attributes.action: Traffic control at paradise orchard outside Aylesbury Vale Academy
attributes.additional_details: We want the traffic controls outside and around the schools, double yellow lines or keep clear with cctv camera for penalties
attributes.background: Cars and buses are parked outside and around the schools blocking the streets, children's safety at risk, drivers can't see through properly when cars are parked and traffic equestrian and jammes

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://democracy.aylesburyvaledc.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
